casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Eugene REED, II 232P01-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Michael Eugene Reed, II, for Reed, Michael Eugene II. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of February 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017." Hudson, J. recused
